title: New: Gold Panda – MPB
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/sophie.jpg "sophie")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8739-new-gold-panda-mpb/attachment/sophie/)Artwork by [Sophie Greenidge](http://www.flickr.com/photos/imapirateee/)

Hey look, it’s a new **Gold Panda** tune! Now try not to explode too much and take a listen, because what you’ll find is something that spirals uncontrollably, is thick with percussion crunches and bends beautifully to some jangly little melodies. Welcome back Mr. Panda.

 [Gold Panda “MPB”](http://soundcloud.com/fadermedia/gold-panda-mpb) by [The FADER](http://soundcloud.com/fadermedia)

Welcome back Mr. Panda. Gold Panda “MPB” by The FADER
